location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor in Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the finances of the Residency, and forwards to the civil auditor the cash account for the Residency, with several vouchers (not included in the file), for the quarter ending 31 October 1825.
